tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE feedback_data (
  feedback_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  customer_id INT,
  feedback_text TEXT,
  feedback_date TIMESTAMP,
  sentiment_score FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE feedback_data (feedback_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  customer_id INT,
  feedback_text TEXT,
  feedback_date TIMESTAMP,
  rating INT);

CREATE TABLE sentiment_analysis (analysis_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  feedback_id INT,
  sentiment_score FLOAT,
  analysis_date DATE);

CREATE TABLE CustomerFeedbacks (
    feedback_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_id UUID,
    product_id UUID,
    feedback_text TEXT,
    rating INTEGER,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE SentimentAnalysis (
    analysis_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    feedback_id UUID REFERENCES CustomerFeedbacks(feedback_id),
    sentiment_score FLOAT,
    sentiment_label VARCHAR(50),
    analysis_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE ProductImprovements (
    improvement_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    product_id UUID REFERENCES CustomerFeedbacks(product_id),
    improvement_text TEXT,
    implementation_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE customer_feedback (
  feedback_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  customer_id INT,
  feedback_text TEXT,
  sentiment_score INT,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE sentiment_analysis (
  analysis_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  feedback_id INT,
  sentiment_result TEXT,
  analysis_timestamp TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE product_feedback (
  product_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  feedback_id INT,
  feedback_text TEXT,
  feedback_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE product_improvements (
  improvement_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  product_id INT,
  improvement_text TEXT,
  implementation_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE customer_sentiment (
  customer_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  sentiment_score INT,
  sentiment_category TEXT,
  sentiment_timestamp TIMESTAMP
)
